Text: One Big Happy Family is an American reality television series featuring the Coles family, an African-American family of four who reside in Indian Trail, North Carolina.

Triplets:<One Big Happy Family

Text: One Big Happy Family:  The series premiered on TLC on December 29, 2009.

<Text: One Big Happy Family:  The show deals with their family life and with their efforts to lose weight, (each family member, at the initial episode, weighed in excess of 330 pounds).>
